column1: # Child is scared of sleeping alone

column2: You awaken late in the night to little [FROM.GetFirstName] attempting to crawl up into the bed. Murmuring sleepily, you ask what the problem is. [FROM.GetFirstName] responds that he/she was scared by a bad dream and wants to come sleep with [FROM.GetHerHim] mother.
It was only a dream. You shouldn’t be afraid of such things.
You sternly tell [FROM.GetFirstName] that [FROM.GetSheHe] must return to [FROM.GetHerHim] own bed.
Bad dreams? I’ll give you something to be afraid of you little whelp!
A harsh word and a quick lash will teach this child manners.
You invite the child to come and sleep with in the bed with you, at least for tonight.

column1: # 3-5 Child refuses to share toys with fellow courtier kid/sibling.
# 2-5 Child breaks something while playing with toys
